FacilityPermissionsForm.formalDescriptio: Makarantu da sauran yanayin koyo da hukuma ta amince dasu.
FacilityPermissionsForm.learningEnvironm: A wane irin wurin koyo ne cibiyarka take?
FacilityPermissionsForm.nonFormalDescrip: Dakin karatu, gidan marayu, cibiyar matasa, dakunan na'ura mai ƙwaƙwalwa da sauran wuraren koyo da ba na hukuma ba
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.fullDeviceDesc: Wannan na'ura za a tsara ya isa tsarin Kolibri ma admins da masu horaswa da masu koyo
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.learnOnlyDevic: Na'urar na iya samun sama da asusun masu koyo da yawa da aka dauko daga waya na'ura. Asusun masu koyo zasu jona kansu kai tsaye da cikakkiyar wayar.
GuestAccessForm.changeLater: Kana iya canza saitin wayarka nan gaba.
GuestAccessForm.description: Wannan kafa na nuna maka kayan karatu a sashen Kolibri na tare da an bukaci asusu ba.
GuestAccessForm.header: Shin zaka bayar da damar amfani da Kolibri ba tare da asusu ba?
GuestAccessForm.noOptionLabel: A'a. Sai kana da asusu kafin ka yi amfani da Kolibri.
HowAreYouUsingKolibri.groupLearningDescr: Wannan na'urar na bukatar jonawa da sauran na'urori masu amfani da Kolibri a makarantu ko wasu dandalin saitin koyo.
ImportIndividualUserForm.deviceLimitatio: '{full_name} ({username})' shine admin kan '{device}'. Wannan na'ura an takaita ta ne ga masu koyo. Wasu masallaci masu koyo kawai. Maɓallan masu horaswa da admin zai bace.

'{full_name} ({username})' na'ura ce kan {non_admin_role} bisa '{device}'. Wannan na'ura an takaita ta. Maɓallan wannan an takaita su ne kawai ga masu koyo. Wasu Maɓallan masu horaswa da admin na za su samu ba.
ImportIndividualUserForm.doNotHaveUserCr: Shin ba ka da damar shiga?

RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionL: A'a. Masu koyo na iya shiga ta hanyar amfani kawai da sunan mai amfani.
